thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 5 of 1920
thread.title: Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: I thought that booking the flight was a straight-forward and simple process. I especially appreciated the fact that it shows everything in Canadian Dollars, so that's never a worry. There are also no hidden fees, I was not shocked when I went to check-out. Although one suggestion I do have is that sometimes when all the flight options come up it can be quite overwhelming based on how many options I have (of the SAME price) so maybe have clear distinctions.
